text: Visva sinhasanavannu hottiruvavaru mattu adara sutta iruvavaru (malak‌galu) tam'ma odeyanannu prasansisutta avara pavitravannu japisuttiruttare. Avaru avanalli nambike ittiruttare mattu visvasigala paravagi ksameyacisuttiruttare; ‘‘nam'modeya, ninna krpe hagu jnanavu ellavannu avarisikondide. Pascattapa paduvavarannu hagu ninna margavannu anusarisuvavarannu ksamisibidu mattu avarannu narakada sikseyinda raksisu’’
